column1: Kata Robata////Decided to try out this place with a friend after we arrived to Yildizlar across the street and it was closed for the evening. I was pleasantly surprised by the food
column2: and with a few tweaks to the atmosphere and service
column3: this place could quickly become a fave. Between the two of us
column4: we ordered some edamame (pretty standard - good)
column5: two varieties of the beef robata
column6: which were both tender and delicious
